mapper.update: update tbl_project_info set PROJECT_PLAN_STATUS = #{planStatus} where ID = #{projectId}
mapper.select: select plan.ID id,plan.PLAN_CODE code,plan.PLAN_NAME name,plan.DELIVERABLES description, plan.PLAN_START_MILESTONE startIsMilestone1,plan.PLAN_END_MILESTONE endIsMilestone1, plan.PLAN_LEVEL level from tbl_project_plan_template plan where plan.STATUS = 1

select plan.ID id,plan.PLAN_CODE code,plan.PLAN_NAME name,plan.RESPONSIBLE_USER_ID userId, plan.DELIVERABLES description, plan.PLAN_START_DATE start,plan.PLAN_START_MILESTONE startIsMilestone1, plan.PLAN_END_DATE 'end',plan.PLAN_END_MILESTONE endIsMilestone1,plan.PLAN_DURATION duration,plan.PLAN_SCHEDULE progress, plan.PLAN_LEVEL level,tui.ID userId,tui.USER_NAME userName from tbl_project_plan plan left join tbl_user_info tui on tui.ID = plan.RESPONSIBLE_USER_ID where plan.PROJECT_ID = #{projectId} and plan.STATUS = 1 and tui.STATUS = 1 order by plan.PLAN_ORDER asc
select tpi.PROJECT_PLAN_STATUS from tbl_project_info tpi where tpi.ID = #{projectId} and tpi.STATUS = 1
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_project_plan( PROJECT_ID, PLAN_CODE, PLAN_NAME, RESPONSIBLE_USER_ID, DELIVERABLES, PLAN_START_DATE, PLAN_START_MILESTONE, PLAN_END_DATE, PLAN_END_MILESTONE, PLAN_DURATION, PLAN_WORKLOAD, PLAN_SCHEDULE, ACTUAL_START_DATE, ACTUAL_END_DATE, PARENT_ID, PARENT_IDS, PLAN_LEVEL, PLAN_ORDER, STATUS, CREATE_BY, CREATE_DATE, LAST_UPDATE_BY, LAST_UPDATE_DATE )values( #{projectId}, #{planCode}, #{planName}, #{responsibleUserId}, #{deliverables}, #{planStartDate}, #{planStartMilestone}, #{planEndDate}, #{planEndMilestone}, #{planDuration}, #{planWorkload}, #{planSchedule}, #{actualStartDate}, #{actualEndDate}, #{parentId}, #{parentIds}, #{planLevel}, #{planOrder}, #{status}, #{createBy}, #{createDate}, #{lastUpdateBy}, #{lastUpdateDate})
mapper.select: select plan.ID,plan.PLAN_CODE,plan.PLAN_NAME,plan.RESPONSIBLE_USER_ID, plan.DELIVERABLES,plan.PLAN_START_DATE,plan.PLAN_START_MILESTONE, plan.PLAN_END_DATE,plan.PLAN_END_MILESTONE,plan.PLAN_DURATION,plan.PLAN_SCHEDULE, plan.PLAN_LEVEL,tui.USER_NAME from tbl_project_plan plan left join tbl_user_info tui on tui.ID = plan.RESPONSIBLE_USER_ID where plan.PROJECT_ID = #{projectId} and plan.STATUS = 1 and tui.STATUS = 1 order by plan.PLAN_ORDER asc

SELECT t.ID id,t.USER_ACCOUNT userAccount,t.USER_NAME userName FROM tbl_user_info t WHERE t.STATUS = 1 and (t.USER_ACCOUNT LIKE CONCAT('%',#{userAndAccount},'%') OR t.USER_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{userAndAccount},'%')) order by t.ID asc LIMIT 0,10

SELECT DISTINCT userinfo.ID id,
userinfo.USER_ACCOUNT userAccount, userinfo.USER_NAME userName,
userinfo.USER_STATUS userStatus FROM TBL_USER_INFO userinfo LEFT JOIN tbl_project_group_user pgUser ON pgUser.USER_ID = userinfo.ID and pgUser.status = 1 LEFT JOIN tbl_project_group pg ON pg.ID = pgUser.PROJECT_GROUP_ID and pg.status = 1 LEFT JOIN tbl_project_info project ON project.ID = pg.PROJECT_ID and project.status = 1
where userinfo.status = 1 and userinfo.USER_STATUS=1 and (userinfo.USER_ACCOUNT LIKE CONCAT('%',#{userAndAccount},'%') OR userinfo.USER_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{userAndAccount},'%'))
and project.ID IN (
select PROJECT_ID from tbl_project_system tps where tps.SYSTEM_ID = #{systemId} and tps.status=1
)
ORDER BY userinfo.id asc LIMIT 0,30
select ID id,PLAN_CODE planCode,PLAN_NAME planName,PLAN_LEVEL planLevel from tbl_project_plan where ID = #{id} and STATUS = 1 order by PLAN_ORDER asc
